value.original: Users are able to create new Handling Units from scanned Batches. As output of this process are newly generated Handling Units and Inventory Moves from Transit Warehouse to Destination Warehouse based on scanned Distribution Orders.

row.value: Users are able to create new Handling Units from scanned Batches. As output of this process are newly generated Handling Units and Inventory Moves from Transit Warehouse to Destination Warehouse based on scanned Distribution Orders.

value.original: This Window allows to generate a new document as the result of gathering Sales Orders, Manufacturing Orders, Distribution Orders based on several criteria.

row.value: 生成联合了各种单据的入库订单

value.original:
Warehouse, Order, Document Type, Promised Date range, Ordered Dates, Business Partner, Country, Zip Code, Product and Shipper, these parameters can be configured leveraging the Smart Browse artifact. Thus, it is required to previously define those parameters to be used in orther to determine wich products are to be included in the Picking Orders, these paraneters are:
*Area Type *Section type *Overwrite Delivery Rule *Generate Picking List *Print Picking List *Stand-by Location *Document Status for the Picking Order

row.value:
Warehouse, Order, Document Type, Promised Date range, Ordered Dates, Business Partner, Country, Zip Code, Product and Shipper, these parameters can be configured leveraging the Smart Browse artifact. Thus, it is required to previously define those parameters to be used in orther to determine wich products are to be included in the Picking Orders, these paraneters are:
*Area Type *Section type *Overwrite Delivery Rule *Generate Picking List *Print Picking List *Stand-by Location *Document Status for the Picking Order
从出库订单生成发货单

value.original: User able to create Shipments based on outbound orders. Output: Shipment to Customer

row.value: 用户可以根据出库订单创建发货单（客户）。
